name: sigurd
normalized: pitiful, if i do say so myself.
valkyrie sigurd slowly moved her clear eyes and reassessed the situation she'd been put in.
three days had already passed since the siege began.
both food and water rations had been cut off.
it was unlikely that reinforcements would come.
the divine forces had concentrated all resources into the capture of strongholds of the two great powers, the so-called hel jotnar, and had failed.
the tables had turned, and woefully, they had been annihilated.
that was why sigurd and her allies were the final united force in all of asgard.
the commander of her enemy, the hel jotnar "flungruni" had pressed sigurd into total submission.
sigurd, one of the final valkyrie, had no intention of surrendering to flungruni.
on the contrary, she gathered the remaining troops and sought a final battle.
however, she had been outnumbered.
compared to the rival forces, sigurd's troops were readily overwhelmed and fell.
as may be expected of the divine forces which knew naught of fear, in the end, they became but coloring upon the frozen lands.

name: sigurd
normalized: …and at the end, it was us who became besieged, huh?
sigurd, who was reflecting on the fight, murmured that with a bit of self-blame.
and then once again, she surveyed the enemy army spread below.

name: sigurd
normalized: the enemy has roughly 1,00,00 troops, huh?
we've got about 10,00 remaining…
it was an undeniable truth that sigurd's army was at an overwhelming disadvantage.

name: sigurd
normalized: pitiful, if i do say so myself.
sigurd once again sighed at herself, who had been besieged for many days now.
it was that moment.

name: soldier a
normalized: lady sigurd!
a solider had run up in a state of panic.
there was distinct bewilderment and disease on her face.
in a complete turn from when she was sighing, sigurd's face instantly stiffened.
the solider rushed to sigurd's side and, flustered, opened her mouth.

name: soldier a
normalized: lady sigurd!
the alliance has… the alliance has…!

name: sigurd
normalized: you're flustered.
calm down some.
sigurd disarmed her stiffened expression and spoke to the solider in concern.
the sight of his commander brought the soldier back to her senses, and she bowed his head to sigurd.

name: sigurd
normalized: so, what is it?

name: soldier
normalized: ma'am!
the alliance plans to break through the gateway with a massive battering ram.

name: sigurd
normalized: so they've finally come?
sigurd spoke emotionlessly and took a fleeting glance at the castle gate.
the jotnar were heading this way, four jotunn carrying a massive log in tow.

name: sigurd
normalized: it's time to prepare.
sigurd took a breath and whispered with dignity.

name: soldier a
normalized: we've already come this far.
let us fight bravely until we fall, and shed even the slightest of blood upon the frozen land.
the soldier spoke out, her throat shaking.

name: sigurd
normalized: don't be foolish.
sir odin will not allow his noble soldiers to die in vain on his watch.

name: sigurd
normalized: victory shows herself to those who believe there is a chance.
and we do have that chance.
sigurd raised her voice with dignity, her expression filled with confidence.
despite the overwhelming odds, her speech did not lose its majesty.

name: sigurd
normalized: we will not allow flungruni to get his way.
so she said, with a hand at her abdomen.
as a matter of course, there was naught an inkling of intent within her heart to prostrate herself and admit defeat.

name: sigurd
normalized: of course, i believe in your tactic of holding this castle, too.
svia.
valkyrie sigurd slowly descended the staircase and stood before the very gates they were attempting to destroy, and spoke that soliloquy.
-valkyrie-
the very best warriors chosen by those in this world's celestial plane -- namely, the land in which the gods resided -- to face the impending ragnarok.
battle goddesses.
when the valkyrie rode onto the battlefield, even their allies would be charmed by their valiance and beauty.
war maidens.
the soldiers called them thus, with a sense of aspiration in their hearts.
until just a few short months prior, there were no fewer than a hundred valkyrie in asgard.
however, not one who had invaded the underground had returned to tell the tale.
not even the one who commanded the valkyrie -- the chief valkyrie, "freyja" -- had learned their whereabouts.
ultimately, their were two valkyrie left in asgard.
while the divine forces were leading an offense on the underground, these two had been left behind to protect their own country.
the first of the left behind was "valkyrie sigurd.
once a human born of a needy farmer, she now leads odin's troops as a battle goddess.
as might be expected of one said to have the grace of a goddess of beauty, she was extremely gorgeous.
her hair tied up behind her back danced on the battlefield.
and with each swing of her blade, which was almost as tall as she was, numerous soldiers were mesmerized and followed her command with pleasure.
and the second was "valkyrie svia.
though she was born an affluent noble guaranteed a lifetime of comfort in the land of gods, as a valkyrie, she threw that life away and cast herself onto the battlefield of her own volition.
studying that which we call "discipline" on her own, she was reared into an elite soldier, to the extent that it would be hard to say which of the two valkyrie was stronger.
she was as far from the image of a blood-stained solider as she could be, well-suited to the term "pure.
but on the other hand, on the inside, the cold blood of a combatant flowed through her veins.
she was quiet and absorbed in battle.
furthermore she always calmly analyzed the state of battle and laid out precise tactics.
if you were to combine a fanatic and a sage, they would surely be this girl.
due to that idiosyncratic strength, and in a certain way her tendency toward egotism, this girl who was deemed unfit to supervise others was accepted into the reserve corps.
that same valkyrie svia had suddenly disappeared into thin air a month ago.
standing before the castle gate, valkyrie sigurd quietly closed her eyes.
what rose to sigurd's mind was valkyrie svia, who had disappeared.
back then, and now still, there were many who spoke ill of svia, saying things such as, "she betrayed us…" and "she got scared and ran away.
sigurd remembered svia's words on the day she left--

name: svia
normalized: sigurd, i threw away my high social status and became a valkyrie because i just love fighting so very much.

name: svia
normalized: …how much, exactly?

name: svia
normalized: let me see… so much it makes things like romantic love fade into obscurity before a battle.
that's how excited and heart-racing it is.

name: sigurd
normalized: that sounds very like you, svia.
though it may not have shown much on her face, there was a clear emotion of joy in svia's voice.
sigurd had heard her words with a gentle expression.

name: svia
normalized: when i was still a child, i was scolded often.
that's why i indulged in reading books about things like the art of war, tactics, and military history.

name: sigurd
normalized: since childhood?
that's quite hardcore.

name: svia
normalized: yes, quite.
i feel much boredom when the world isn't at war.

name: sigurd
normalized: … svia, are you enjoying the current situation?
svia answered nothing and turned to sigurd with an expressionless demeanor.
the current situation… it was very serious.
the world tree, yggdrasil.
the one and only great tree which penetrated this world.
the central pillar which supported the world.
this world was divided into three planes: the heavenly, earthly, and underworldly.
divine beings lived in the celestial plane, humans and animals in the earthly, and the jotnar and denizens of hel in the underworldly.
the world tree penetrated through the center and became the support of all three.
flowing through the root of this world tree was the "river of wisdom.
" the world tree supported the world with this river of wisdom as its food source.
if the world tree were to wither, the three worlds would lose their support… the worlds would collapse, and demise would follow.
that grave situation was now becoming a reality.
the most prominent of divine beings, "odin," had been taken captive and was being confined in the underworld.
because of this, the power balance among the three major powers which had ruled thus far -- the divine aesir, the jotnar, and denizens of hel -- had crumbled and dissent had prevailed.
the divine forces had dedicated all efforts to attempt to rescue odin, and had met the allied forces of the hel jotnar in combat.
however, the traitorous god, loki, had snatched away the invincible spear gungnir from odin and given it to the jotnar, and as such, the valkyries of the divine army had been tragically defeated.
the allied forces snickered.
at long last, they were able to ascend to the earthly plane from the underworldly, which had been sealed since the dawn of time.
however, odin had not been captured without cost.
odin, chained to the base of the world tree, had managed to lock the flood gates of the river of knowledge which supplied the world tree with its lifeblood, the water of knowledge.
and, odin had said thus: "if thou wishest not for the world tree to wither, release me.
the allied forces were panicked.
they were but a step away from world conquest.
if the world were destroyed, they would lose everything.
a rumor had reached their worried ears that they could open the flood gates with keys concealed within the bodies of two valkyries.
the problem had then become which valkyries possessed these keys.
but they were able to extract the information from the captured chief of valkyries, freyja, by means of pleasure and torture.
sigurd" and "svia"-- the keys were embedded within these two valkyries' wombs.
the two valkyrie, left behind under the guise of "protecting the divine forces' homefront in their absence," were actually shouldering the important mission of protecting the keys to the floodgates.
once they learned of this, the jotnar and denizens of hel were said to be confident in their victory.
at any rate, there were fewer than 10,00 divine solders remaining.
there was far too much of a gap in power between the two sides as the allied forces were more than a million strong.
it was for this reason the jotnar and denizens of hel had declared all-out war with the divine forces.
thus they could capture sigurd and svia, open the floodgates with the key, and hold the world in the palms of their hands.

name: svia
normalized: sigurd, are you not enjoying the current situation?
sigurd faced her directly, and svia quietly asked in return…

name: sigurd
normalized: i…
sigurd was at a loss for words and averted her eyes from svia.
however, it seemed as though a smile was coming upon her face.
sigurd returned her averted eyes to svia.

name: sigurd
normalized: i have no intention of submitting to the likes of them.

name: svia
normalized: in other words, you will fight.
right, sigurd?

name: sigurd
normalized: that is a foolish question, svia.
sigurd and svia's fighting-spirit-filled glares entwined with one another.
those glares seemed so frigid they could freeze even the air between them.

name: svia
normalized: i, too, have not even the slightest desire to surrender, just as you say.
but i desire to lose even less than that.

name: svia
normalized: so, sigurd, trust me and lead the soldiers.
it's all right.
i'll bring us the chance to prevail, so trust in that.

name: sigurd
normalized: i trust you, svia.
after whispering that with crooked lips, sigurd slowly opened her eyes.
the latch along the doors of the gate creaked open.
at last, the stagnation of being confined to this castle for the past three days had ended.

name: sigurd
normalized: everyone proceed to my rear.
take revenge upon the enemies before the gate.
however!
do not engage the enemy until i say.
i shall encounter them first!
so sigurd shouted as the doors of the gate were destroyed.
the soldiers cheered at the sound of the valkyrie's gallant voice.

name: sigurd
normalized: now, come!
i, valkyrie sigurd, will never show my back to mine enemy!
and then, the castle gate was penetrated.
the doors burst open, and once they were aware that sigurd lay within, the enemy army suddenly became excited.
their opponent was a single valkyrie.
what's more, when the enemy army ascertained that it was their enemy's targeted leader, they contended with her head-on with their individually preferred tactics.

name: sigurd
normalized: my name is valkyrie sigurd!
any who wish to challenge my army will only do so after trampling over my dead body!
sigurd said this, drew her sword and took a mighty leap, slashing with vigor at the enemy, a force so vast that it could not be contained within one's field of vision.

name: sigurd
normalized: haah!
each time sigurd brandished her sword, a denizen of hel amusingly turned to a chunk of meat.
'splosh, splosh.
quite easily.
almost as if she were cutting through air.

name: sigurd
normalized: haa!
sigurd tore through the forces of evil and swung her holy sword filled with such divine strength that they would never regenerate again.
縦に――横に――斜めに――
the enemy soldiers who marched in were minced and tragically annihilated.
and similarly, the denizens of hel, so full of vitality…

name: flungruni
normalized: goo, don't falteer!
there's only one enemy!
the enemy's supreme commander, flungruni, yelled out without prudence.

name: sigurd
normalized: 'only'?
don't toy with me, flungruni.
i am not alone.
i shoulder the entirety of my nation!
my nation drives me.
sigurd yelled as she vehemently continued to swing her blade.

name: sigurd
normalized: fuu!
haa!
though she had already slain hundreds, neither her agility nor the sharpness of her blade had dwindled.
the divine soldiers let out great cheers of joy.
this was the very image of one worthy of the title of an awe-inspiring battle goddess.
the divine forces were utterly taken by the sight of the so-called goddess of beauty, sigurd's, battle, and once more solidified their determination to give their lives for her.
